name: Play4Cash
description: Play4Cash is a BEP20 token and has a launcher app that rewards players for playing games. You can earn $P4C while you are playing the most popular games like PUBG, LoL, Fortnite, etc and there is an option to add any game to the reward program without a partnership. So people won't wait for partnerships. You must hold $250 worth of $P4C to be rewarded. 1% of the volume goes into the reward pool. For example, if we have $1m volume and 500 players, the daily rewards will be $20 per player.
